'''GazomÃ¨tre''' is a [[Charleroi Metro]] station, located in [[Gilly]] (part of the [[Charleroi]] municipality), in fare zone 2. GazomÃ¨tre is an underground station featuring a central platform, with street access at the eastern end only.
While trams drive on the right on most of the Charleroi Pre-metro network, they drive on the left on the [[Gilly]] line, of which GazomÃ¨tre is part.
== Nearby points of interest ==
* ''ZAMI'' business park.
